pages.name: Falling Tower
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier construction.

Using the vast powers at your disposal, the obvious next step is to summon a meteor from outer space to crash upon the world.$(br2)By dropping an appropriate offering on top of the MRS, the ritual will consume the item (plus a large amount of LP) and summon a meteor at the build height of the map. Once the meteor hits a solid block, it will detonate and leave behind its resource rich shell.
